name: That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Pixel Hero
name_original: That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Pixel Hero
description:
A game that has nothing to do with reincarnation other than a silly joke in the title!

Fight an endless horde of monsters!

Use an unorthodox amount of powerups!

Don't let the monsters reach the castle!

If your spacebar works right now, it won't after playing this game!
